trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: Define os métodos chamados durante a geração de contrato que pode ser usada para modificar o código gerado para um contrato de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IServiceContractGenerationExtension interface on a contract behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: Implementar a interface IServiceContractGenerationExtension um comportamento de contrato (um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>tipo) para que você possa modificar o código gerado quando um contrato ou o ponto de extremidade é compilado em código.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> inserts a custom contract behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um personalizado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>insere um comportamento de contrato personalizado na <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção durante a chamada <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: Implemente para modificar o modelo de objeto de documento de código antes do processo de geração de contrato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName> to modify the contract, operations, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> prior to code generation.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName>para modificar o contrato, operações, ou o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName>antes da geração de código.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The code generated context to use to modify the code document prior to generation.
trans-unit.target: O código gerado contexto a ser usado para modificar o documento de código antes da geração.
